channel.title: Epidemiology on Columbia DSI Scholars
channel.description: Recent content in Epidemiology on Columbia DSI Scholars

item.title: Studies Lifestyle Behaviors (Diet, Sleep, and Circadian rest-activity rhythms in relation) to Cardiometabolic Outcomes
item.description: I am conducting studies on lifestyle behaviors, in particular diet, sleep behaviors, and circadian rest-activity rhythms in relation to cardiometabolic outcomes (hypertension, type 2 diabetes, and obesity). Sample sizes of my studies range from n=100 to n=16,000.
